ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: Restricts certain functions to owner and bot via modifiers
ImplementedSecurityControls.BalanceChecks: Ensures sufficient balance to cover bets, jackpot, and dev fees

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackFunction: Allows users to send Ether directly to the contract

KillSwitch.SelfDestruct: Permits contract destruction if no bets are active
